document_data.name: ''Darkskull''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''darkskull''''' was a powerful [[magical item]] that was wholly [[evil]] in nature.
document_data.Description: They were carved entirely out of a single piece of [[ebony]].
document_data.Powers:
A ''darkskull'' emanated unholy energy and ''[[unhallow|tainted everything]]'' within its vicinity.

It was possible for a ''darkskull'' to be 'redeemed'. Upon this occurrence, silver holy symbols would appear upon its surface, and the {{SIAdj|80|ft|adj=wide}} area around the skull would be marked as ''[[hallow|hallowed ground]]''.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Szass Tam]], [[zulkir]] of [[necromancy]] and eventual regent of [[Thay]].
